name: BOB ASTROSS
description:
This game was made in a group of 2 people for a GDS Jam 2022.

The idea of the game is to prevent the enemy from seeing you by destroying their ways of exploring the sky.

How to Play:

  1. WD / Left/Right arrow keys - Move around the orbit
  2. Hold down left mouse button - Aim projectile at enemy
  3. Hold down right mouse button - Select projectile type
  4. Mind the cooldown shown at top part of the screen
  5. Each projectile has its own cooldown
  6. Survive as long as you can - do not get detected by the enemy
  7. Relax to the soothing voice of Bob Ross while listening to some sweet jam
  8. Have fun :)

Development (Discord usernames are provided):

Kuba (ヤクブ (Yakubu)#6969)

Michal (Bud#0006)
